title: Discovery of Axon Caliber Changes Post-trauma
summary: Research at Dr. Vassilis Koliatsos' Lab
description: I transitioned to doing data analysis at my lab in the beginning of the pandemic. Tasked with thousands of entries in Excel to filter through, I self-studied Python and eventually used Pandas and Numpy to do so programmatically. Then I used Prism to visualize the data and discovered a left-ward shift in axon diameter distributions in mouse corticospinal tract weeks after traumatic brain injury. The results are now published. Please see the publication section on this web for more information.
